: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus arrives back at the maximal base, transforming as he enters 
the base.

Rodimus Prime(via commlink): I'll take care of it Yggdrasil. I'll 
just await your return so we can get started.

Rodimus heads to the CR room. He sets Blackstorm's chamber to a 
enduced stasis cycle.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil: I'd come if I could. This data thing is quite difficult 
to 
> handle, even for me. Over that, I've got to check on Azure. I think 
> he's getting it bad inside Pred Base... He might not even make it 
out 
> strong enough to come back to base. If you can place her in a 
> suspensive stasis lock until I arrive, that'd be great!
>

That

destroyed.
